activities: Personal information collected online and offline in connection with business activities of Cisco and its affiliates, including information concerning prospective, current and former: customers; suppliers and vendors; partners and resellers. Cisco and its affiliates use personal information received from the EU online via www.cisco.com (including meraki.cisco.com) and www.webex.com (such as registration and order forms) and in connection with products and services primarily for (1) customer service activities, such as processing orders, providing technical support and improving offerings; (2) sales and marketing activities as permissible under applicable law; (3) enabling and providing services, including services offered by means of the products described at the websites listed above; and (4) internal business processes and management, fraud detection and prevention, and compliance with governmental, legislative and regulatory bodies.  Human resources data is addressed in a separate certification.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and Offline Customer, Prospect, Partner and Supplier Data; Services Data
